full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RJE BTZUN YID BZHIN 'KHOR LO'I BLA BRGYUD BDAG MDUN GYI CHO GA SMON LAM LAM LE TSAN SHIS BRJOD BCAS DGE LEGS BDUD RTZI'I CHAR 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
